body.name: ETUDE HOUSE Soonjung Hydro Barrier Cream BIG SIZE 130ml (New Version) | Moisturizing and soothing cream | Korean Skin Care | Care Solution for sensitive skin | K-Beauty
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 20% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 4 mins
features: 92.2% OF MOISTURIZING AND MOISTURE-PRESERVING INGREDIENTS: A hydro soothing cream that moisturizes and comforts skin
INGREDIENT CALLOUTS (FRAGRANCE-FREE): Free of animal materials, mineral oil, pigment synthesis, synthetic perfume, polyacrylamide, imidazolidinyl urea, triethanolamine, PEG surfactants, paraben

SKIN BARRIER & SOOTHING CARE: We have investigated in finding the causes of sensitive skin such as dryness and weakening of the skin barrier to bring out solutions to healthy skin care. It contains “Panthensoside”: Panthenol (Protection of skin barrier & maintenance of hydration) + Madecassoside (Calms down irritated skin and helps protect skin)

DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED: The product has passes various skin tests to verify its hypo-allergenic formula. NON-COMEDOGENIC! Tested on skin to prove that the product does not cause breakouts or make the skin worse. HYPO-ALLERGENIC! Patch test completed to measure the scale of irritation on skin

NON-IRRITATING, LOW pH FORMULA (WEAKLY ACIDIC): SoonJung’s formula helps women and men’s skin to maintain the correct, low pH level. Chemicals with an alkaline pH are detrimental to skin’s protective barrier, making it more prone to dryness and other various external factors. Low pH products calm down and take care of your sensitive skin

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: S.O.S solution for damage care We have investigated in finding causes of sensitive skin such as dryness and weakening of skin barrier to bring out solutions to healthy skin care. Panthensoside [Panthenol] Protects skin barrier and helps maintaining hydration.[Madecassoside] Takes care of damaged skin. Hypo-allergenic verification system Has passed various skin tests to verify its hypo-allergenic formula. Low pH formula SoonJung's formula helps your skin maintain the correct, low pH level.Chemicals with an alkaline pH are detrimental to skin's protective barrier, making it more prone to dryness and other various external factors.Take care of your skin with low pH products when your skin feels sensitive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this daily twice a day as my main moisturizer. It's creamy but pretty lightweight and moisturizes so well. There's no scent, so it's great for everybody. Not sticky at all and leaves your skin nice and glowy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Love Love!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Soon Jung for months now. I was ordering this off of Soko Glam but it always took long to receive my order. Found this on amazon and it's much bigger and is exactly the same (WELL...I HOPE). It has no scent - no fragrance which I love. It's super gentle and lightweight! I've had this same bottle for a couple months now.. it lasts a while!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this moisturizer. It’s great for sensitive skin and does not break me out. It does not have a smell and seems to be a more light weight moisturizer. I use this as well as the cleanser and my skin has been literalllly glowing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thick and Creamy
reviews.reviewText: Great moisturizer, great value because you dont need to use that much. The bottom of the plastic jar did cut my finger causing bleeding so be mindful of that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm a fan of this moisturizer! It leaves my skin feeling soft without any stickiness and works well for my sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve already bought this moisturizer twice. I cannot go without it. My skin is oily acne-prone and very sensitive. This moisturizer not only hydrates my skin, it also soothes and calms any irritation or redness I have from using too many actives. (Which I do frequently, I use adapalene gel and benzoyl peroxide and azeliac acid.) It’s also sooo oily skin friendly. I believe the cream is water based so it doesn’t leave a shiny film on my face, but my face also doesn’t get oily at all throughout the day. I don’t breakout from it at all either. I guess you could say it leaves a matte finish. With that said, I will continue to purchase this moisturizer!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars i love this moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: i love this moisturizer it’s really lightweight and there’s no scent really. it makes your skin supple and glowy. i ordered this the first time and it was great, but the second time my product came damaged. the lid inside was bent, the little edge is damaged, and lastly the spatula is bent; and the lid was not covering the top it was literally inside the moisturizer. please be more careful when you send product out and if the product is in good condition. it’s ridiculous there’s a sticker on the box that says not returnable after opening. the cream seems the same as always so i’ll deal with the messed up lid.cream is GREAT, packaging just came in bad condition this time. i’m only writing so they don’t give anyone else a bent version!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Moisturizer for face. This cream is so good.Makes my face feel so good. Love the product. No dislikes.

Great light half opaque cream which leaves my face feeling refreshed and keeps the moisture during the day. Great quantity also which is double anything I can get in my local pharmacy so I will get great use out of this. I appreciated the little cap to keep the cream in the container so it wouldn't spill if I were to travel with it as well as the little scoop to prevent you putting your fingers in the cream so it can remain uncontaminated for longer.Loved Etude House products ever since visiting Korea and would purchase again!

Amazing skincare product. The texture is a cross between gel and cream. It is lightweight yet super moisturizing on the skin. It's so spreadable and absorbed quickly. I've used it for 3 days now and I already noticed my red ( I have rocesea) cheeks are less irritated, my pores have gotten smaller, and overall smoother skin. I'm definitely going to try the other products of this skincare line and possibly switch to Soon Jung!
It’s very light weight and easily distributed on the face. The product is soothing to the skin. I use it morning and evening and is very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Item came with the box opened, and some of the cream was on the spatula! Maybe it was manufactured mistake but still…Nice and soft tho and lightweight. But not entirely happy
Arrived super fast. This product is great and very hydrating but not too oily or heavy
